sqlMap.select: $option$ select intBscId,nmParentId,nmGroupId,intRaitype,count(distinct(nmImsi)), #intYear#,#intMonth#,getdate(),#vcLocalIP# from ftbStatNewBussNetSpaceHourUsers_week sourceTable left join dtbGroupTree tree on sourceTable.nmDimensId = tree.nmDimensId where nmTypeId = 1 and nmLevelsId = 2 and intYear = #intYear# and intMonth = #intMonth# group by intBscId,nmParentId,nmGroupId,intRaitype
